TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit VerificationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class VerificationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class VerificationAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定義無障礙網頁開發規則的中繼資料屬性。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute of a Web content accessibility rule.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體類別會定義可驗證的 Web 內容的存取範圍規則。An instance of the class defines a Web content accessibility rule that can be verified. 如需有關 Web 內容的可及性方針的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on Web Content Accessibility Guidelines, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 定義的執行個體所需的資訊最短包括：The minimal amount of information required to define an instance of a includes: - 驗證規則表示指導方針。A guideline that the verification rule represents. 建構函式集合中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 方針的檢查點。A checkpoint of the guideline. 建構函式集合中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 檢查點的優先順序。A checkpoint priority. 建構函式集合中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - A所屬列舉值，表示應該是規則的報告層級。A enumeration value that represents the reporting level that should be rule belongs to. 建構函式集合中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 驗證規則為 true 時，會報告訊息。A message that is reported when the verification rule is true. 建構函式集合中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. 您可以在建立執行個體時指定之驗證規則的選擇性屬性：Optional properties of the verification rule that can be specified when creating an instance: - A列舉值，表示如何解譯驗證規則。A enumeration value that represents how the verification rule should be interpreted. 建構函式集合中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - A列舉值，表示用來測試驗證規則的條件式運算式中的運算子。A enumeration value that represents the operator in the conditional expression used to test the verification rule. 建構函式集合中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 協助工具參考指導方針的 URL。An accessibility reference guideline URL. 建構函式集合中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 條件式值，表示在條件運算式的右邊。A conditional value representing the right side of a conditional expression. 建構函式集合中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 條件屬性，表示在條件運算式的左邊。A conditional property representing the left side of a conditional expression. 建構函式集合中指定的值屬性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. 中繼資料可以是類別、 屬性和索引子的定義的宣告。The metadata can be defined class, property, and indexer declarations. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class. 在驗證中繼資料定義中，使用的指導方針是"WCAG，「 Web 內容可存取性指導方針和 「 ADA"美國殘障人士等更 Act 指導方針。In the verification metadata definition, the guidelines used are "WCAG," the Web Content Accessibility Guideline, and "ADA," Americans with Disabilities Act Guidelines. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 使用檢查點可為"1.1"和"1194.22(a)"WCAG 和 ADA 分別以確保非文字項目是否有文字對等的檢查點。The checkpoints used are "1.1" and "1194.22(a)" for WCAG and ADA, respectively, checkpoints for ensuring that a text equivalent exists for non-text elements. 套用至`ImageText`表示另一個屬性的文字對等用法屬性呼叫`ImageProperty`。The is applied to the `ImageText` property that represents the text equivalent of another property called `ImageProperty`. 如果`ImageText`屬性未設定，網頁可及性驗證將會傳回訊息 「 映像缺少文字對等用法。 」If the `ImageText` property is not set, the accessibility verification will return the message "The image is missing a text equivalent." [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute/cs/VerificationAttributeExample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute/vb/VerificationAttributeExample.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with accessibility guideline, checkpoint, reporting level, checkpoint priority, and error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式的類別會指定最低限度的定義的驗證規則所需的資訊。The constructor of the class specifies the minimal amount of information needed to define a verification rule. 下列的預設值會假設執行個體：The following default values for the instance are assumed: - 屬性設定為。The property is set as . - 屬性設定為。The property is set as . - 屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 若要指定屬性的值超出其預設值前述清單中，使用或建構函式多載。To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the or constructor overloads.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with accessibility guideline, checkpoint, reporting level, checkpoint priority, error message, .value, and related conditional property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `conditionalProperty`參數是用來評估的驗證規則的條件運算式的一部分的另一個屬性。The `conditionalProperty` parameter is another property that is used as part of the conditional expression to evaluate the verification rule. 例如，如果規則參數然後相關的屬性所指定`conditionalProperty`不能為空字串 ("")。For example, if the rule parameter is then the related property specified by `conditionalProperty` must not be an empty string (""). 下列的預設值會假設執行個體：The following default values for the instance are assumed: - 屬性設定為。The property is set as . - 屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). 若要指定屬性的值超出其預設值前述清單中，使用建構函式多載。To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the constructor overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這可讓您建立的執行個體使用指定的所有可能屬性的類別。This allows you to create an instance of the class with all the possible properties specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Checkpoint { get; }
.property instance string Checkpoint
Public ReadOnly Property Checkpoint As String
public: property System::String ^ Checkpoint { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得指定之 屬性中的協助工具檢查點參考。

span.span: Gets the accessibility checkpoint reference in the specified property.

value.span: 表示檢查點參考的字串。

span.span: A string representing the checkpoint reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時設定屬性執行個體建立，而且需要。The property is set when the instance is created and is required. 上定義 Web 內容可及性方針[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)屬性會指定為指導方針的數字，後面接著句號 （.） 後面接著檢查點的數字。For the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines defined on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) the property is specified as a guideline number followed by a period (.) followed by a checkpoint number.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ConditionalProperty { get; }
.property instance string ConditionalProperty
Public ReadOnly Property ConditionalProperty As String
public: property System::String ^ ConditionalProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得條件運算式的左邊，用做驗證協助工具檢查點的一部分。

span.span: Gets the left side of a conditional expression used as part of the verification accessibility checkpoint.
The left side of the conditional expression.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性時可以設定執行個體建立時，但是為選擇性。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果您使用建構函式不接受`conditionalProperty`參數，預設值是空字串 ("") 會使用。If you use a constructor that does not take a `conditionalProperty` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used. 屬性是右邊或正在使用中的協助工具檢查點驗證的條件運算式的值。The property is the right side, or value, of a conditional expression that is use in the verification of the accessibility checkpoint. 使用指定的條件運算式的左半部。The left side of the conditional expression is specified with the .

Public ReadOnly Property Guideline As String
public: property System::String ^ Guideline { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用於檢查協助工具的方針。

span.span: Gets the guideline that used for accessibility checking.
A string representing the guideline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時設定屬性執行個體建立，而且需要。The property is set when the instance is created and is required. 指導方針的範例包括"WCAG 1.1 」 和 「 ADA508"。Examples of guidelines include "WCAG 1.1" and "ADA508".

MemberSignature.Value: public string GuidelineUrl { get; }
.property instance string GuidelineUrl
Public ReadOnly Property GuidelineUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ GuidelineUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 URL，可以用來取得 屬性中指定之協助工具方針的詳細資訊。

span.span: Gets the URL the can be used to get more information on the accessibility guidelines given in the property.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性時可以設定執行個體建立時，但是為選擇性。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果您使用建構函式不接受`guidelineUrl`參數，預設值是空字串 ("") 會使用。If you use a constructor that does not take a `guidelineUrl` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used. 輸入字串屬性不會檢查是否正確。The string entered for the property is not checked for correctness.

public: property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

An error string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時設定屬性執行個體建立，而且需要。The property is set when the instance is created and is required.

span.span: Gets the priority of the accessibility checkpoint.
An integer representing the priority.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會定義協助工具屬性的影響。The property defines the property's impact on accessibility. 同時和屬性時，會設定執行個體建立，而且需要。Both the and property are set when the instance is created and is required.

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性時可以設定執行個體建立時，但是為選擇性。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果您使用建構函式不接受`rule`參數，預設值的用。If you use a constructor that does not take a `rule` parameter, the default value of is used.
